Texts.Eng:
Made from only the finest ingredients. A perfect food for Vegans! Can fuel ships (40) and mechs.

Texts.Chs:
仅由最优质的原料制成。素食主义者的完美食物！可以为船只（40艘）和机甲提供燃料。
